content.prompt: Which of the following features of the French Revolution would best support Weber’s argument comparing Fascism to Jacobinism?

choices.label: The passage of laws ending the hereditary privileges of the nobility
Napoleon’s seizure of power from the Directory
The wars to protect Revolutionary France from foreign invasion
The economic price and wage controls imposed during the Reign of Terror
